article_title: SLO County women's shelter gets grant to help domestic violence victims
article_text: The Women’s Shelter Program of San Luis Obispo County was awarded a $215,000 two-year grant from the Blue Shield of California Foundation to promote integrated healthcare services for victims of domestic violence, the program announced Tuesday.
